text: Yesli tebya divit (otsutstviye v nikh very), To (yeshche bol'she) udivlyayut ikh slova: "Kogda my obratimsya v prakh, Neuzhto v obnovlennom vide My budem vnov' vossozdany?" I eto - te, kto ne uveroval (v Allakha), - U nikh na sheyakh (tyazhkiy gruz) tsepey, Oni vse - obitateli Ognya, I v nem im ostavat'sya vechno
